details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.2.9 Transparency - Page transparency
details.description: If the document does not contain a PDF/A output intent, then all pages that contain transparency shall either have a page-level PDF/A output intent or the page dictionary shall include the Group key, and the attribute dictionary that forms the value of that Group key shall include a CS entry whose value shall be used as the default blending colour space.

rule.description: If the document does not contain a PDF/A output intent, then all pages that contain transparency shall either have a page-level PDF/A output intent or the page dictionary shall include the Group key, and the attribute dictionary that forms the value of that Group key shall include a CS entry whose value shall be used as the default blending colour space.
rule.test: gDocumentOutputCS != null || outputColorSpace != null || containsGroupCS == true || containsTransparency == false

error.message: The page contains transparent objects with no blending colour space defined.
